results.definition: marked by or showing unaffected simplicity and lack of guile or worldly experience
examples: a teenager's naive ignorance of life
the naive assumption that things can only get better
this naive simple creature with wide friendly eyes so eager to believe appearances

results.definition: of or created by one without formal training; simple or naive in style
not initiated; deficient in relevant experience
examples: he took part in the experiment as a naive subject
